channel.title: Help me with my client and server
channel.description:
Hi guys
I'm sort of new to the whole private server thing, and I wanted to start my own one, I got my downloads from this fool here
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461134.0.html
I run the server, and that's fine, but when I go to run the client, it it says error connecting to the server, what's my problem? =(
Willing to have anyone help me via teamviewer to help me

item.title: Help me with my client and server
item.dc:creator: @master7257 master7257
item.description:
@master7257 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:6, topic:379696”][quote author=master7257 link=topic=475538.msg3478389#msg3478389 date=1295891806]

Make sure your client is connecting to local host, if it isn’t you’re most likely connecting to somebody else’s ip address.

That’s quite possibly what my problem is, how can I rectify this?
[/quote]
client.java, search for an IP over there.[/quote]
Tried that, got nowhere.
if someone were to dl the same thing, they may be able to talk me though it a little easier, because from what I’ve seen, all of them are laid out differently, so rather than saying ‘go here, do this, change X, Y, Z’
like I said, new to this, I wanna learn, help me =)

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with my client and server

item.title: Help me with my client and server

Make sure your client is connecting to local host, if it isn’t you’re most likely connecting to somebody else’s ip address.
[/quote]
That’s quite possibly what my problem is, how can I rectify this?[/quote]
client.java, search for an IP over there.

Read full topic
